<S%H3606%H6903>That<s%> thou mayest <S%H7066>buy<s%> <S%H629>speedily<s%> with <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3702>money<s%> <S%H8450>bullocks<s%>, <S%H1798>rams<s%>, <S%H563>lambs<s%>, with their meat <S%H4504>offerings<s%> and their drink <S%H5261>offerings<s%>, and <S%H7127>offer<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> the <S%H4056>altar<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of your <S%H426>God<s%> which is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem<s%>.
